Description: Seven and a half beads made of faience and ostrich eggshell. A: One plant-form shaped bead made of light blue faience in a lentoid shape. The base is undecorated, the top is textured with lines for the petals. B: Two flattened spherical beads, made of white faience. C: One and a half spherical beads, made of white faience. D: Three disc-shaped beads, one made of white faience, two made of ostrich eggshell.
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
